title: Interpretations of Ibn Sirin to interpret a dream about wearing it in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes: A dress or a cat is a pet that is distinguished by its attractive appearance and soft texture, but some may feel something different about it, others love raising it and others are afraid of it, and why when we interpret the dream of wearing it, the interpretations may differ and the connotations differ from one opinion to another, In the lines of this article, we will point out the 100 most important interpretations of seeing it in a dream in all circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes. There are hundreds of different interpretations of the dream about wearing clothes, so it is not surprising to see many different connotations between good and evil, as follows: Seeing one’s wild clothes in A married dream may mean that a malicious and disreputable woman is approaching her husband and wants to sabotage their relationship. The dream interpretation of wearing it is said to symbolize denial of the beautiful. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing a black cat in a dream as a sign of being robbed or betrayed. If the dreamer sees a cat standing in front of his house, This is a sign that others are eavesdropping and interfering with his privacy. Hearing screaming in clothes that were embarrassing in a dream could portend bad news, but if the dreamer heard the sound of a cat playing and playing in his dream, this means the beginning of a new phase, whether professional, academic, or in his emotional life. . Interpretation of a dream used by Ibn Sirin. In his interpretation of seeing clothes in a dream, Ibn Sirin mentioned various situations such as: Ibn Sirin, in his interpretation of seeing a pet cat in one dream, indicates a year full of happiness and joy. While seeing a wild cat in a married dream can portend problems, troubles, and fears. In her marital relationship. Whoever sees in his dream that he is scratching himself, this is evidence that his guard is cheating on him, or does not trust a secret to his friend. Interpretation of a dream about wearing one dress: Seeing clothes in an unmarried woman’s dream can indicate something praiseworthy and worthy, depending on the situation Seeing an unmarried woman wearing it in a dream after praying Istikhara is not in her favor, but rather warns her of something. Seeing a white cat in a girl’s dream indicates a close marriage with a good man. If the dreamer sees many cats fighting in his dream, disputes may arise between them. And among her friends. Interpretation of a dream about wearing black clothes for a single woman. Scientists do not praise seeing a black cat in one dream, as we see in their following interpretations: Interpretation of a dream about wearing black clothes for single women indicates a feeling of psychological loneliness, loneliness of the night, and a feeling of emotional emptiness. Watching a girl caress a black cat In a dream, it warns her of the approach of a disreputable and deceitful person. If the fortuneteller sees a black cat in her dream, and its eyes are red, this is clear evidence of strong magic, and the legitimate ruqyah must be fortified. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes for a married woman: Seeing clothes in a dream for a married woman carries within it many Different cases in which the interpretation differs, as shown below: Seeing a married cat eating in a dream shows fear for her children and a desire to raise and discipline them. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing writing on the body in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing writing on the body in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing writing on the body in a dream indicates worries and sins, and God knows best. Also, seeing writing written by hand from the body indicates the death of the misfortunes that befell the pioneer and the cessation of problems and sorrows. A white rose in a dream can indicate upcoming joys and good news, and it can indicate happiness, nourishment, and kindness. Interpretation of seeing writing on the body in a single woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing writing on her body, this indicates the many burdens surrounding her and the many misfortunes. Also, this vision may indicate that the girl will receive kindness and almost eat, and the vision also indicates that she will get married soon, and God knows best. Also, seeing the end of the writing on the body in a dream could indicate the superiority and brilliant success that the girl will achieve in her professional life. Interpretation Seeing writing on the body in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees a tattoo or letters on her body in her dream, this may indicate that she is committing sins and not doing good deeds. This vision may also indicate the dreamer’s many interests, not committing immoral acts and sins, repenting from them, and returning to God. Almighty. This vision may also indicate that the woman is irregular in her behavior with others, and the vision may also indicate that she is pregnant with a child soon. Interpretation of seeing writing on the body in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing writing on the body in a dream, this means that Her worries will be removed and her future affairs will be facilitated, God willing. Also, seeing writing on the body in a dream can indicate the ordeals that the woman will go through and be saved from and the imminent birth. Interpretation of seeing writing on the body in a dream for a man: Seeing a sweet person in a dream that he is writing on the body of a stranger indicates However, he committed adultery and immorality, and God knows best. Likewise, seeing writings on the body in a dream may indicate that the dreamer’s worries have passed and that the dreamer has begun to get a new job and has a lot of money, and God knows best. Also, seeing writings on the body in A dream can mean that a kind man will marry a pious girl and will make a lot of money. Seeing writing may indicate a woman’s decision in a dream, and this vision may indicate a desire to commit adultery with this woman and he will repent for his action. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it Comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a passport in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream for a single woman: It symbolizes changing the situation and moving from bad to good. You may also know entering the house of the dead in a dream. Seeing a passport in a dream indicates travel, as it is used to move from one country to another, and God knows best. Seeing a passport in a dream portends goodness. It changes the dreamer’s situation for the better. Seeing a cut passport in a dream indicates the bitterness of the dreamer’s life and his exposure to extreme poverty and facing many difficulties in his life. Seeing the dreamer obtaining a passport visa states that the dreamer will start a new life, with food, kindness and joy. Read also: Toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream for a single woman is a vision that indicates kindness and the satisfaction of desires. The passport can also indicate real marriage and entering into a serious and successful relationship for this one fatwa. The passport in a dream shows the official marriage certificate. For this unmarried girl. It also symbolizes that this girl will have a successful and famous career opportunity in the near future and a bright future for her. The expiration of the passport indicates that this girl has actually lost her job or lost and lost money, and only God knows. The travel visa with the passport shows The collapse of problems, difficulties and disagreements facing only this girl. The visa stamp in the passport is a sign of the arrival of a great good that will surprise her and fill her life with joy and happiness. A torn passport in a dream is considered an unpleasant vision. We ask God Almighty for safety, as this is evidence of a great loss, and for the girl Caution. Seeing the passport of a single woman who is studying is a sign of success and distinction in their studies and the fulfillment of a dream that has been long awaited for many years. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream for a single woman and update it. The passport is renewed in many government places in different colors. Different depending on the country in which the person resides. On the other hand, each color has a specific interpretation in the dream. Among the colors that indicate goodness are the following: Renewing a passport indicates renewal of life, but if a girl sees that she holds a new blue passport, this indicates that this girl is loyal and has good morals among all members of her family. The new green passport symbolizes the arrival of a young man to engage in marriage. This girl and marriage to this young man in the coming period, and there will be no obstacles and difficulties during the engagement and even marriage. The green passport is also an indication of a lot of money and upcoming halal livelihood and the green color also indicates complete health. Read also: Penguin in a dream What is the interpretation of losing A passport in a dream for a single woman. Losing a passport or forgetting it before leaving the airport indicates dedication to many things in order to avoid all the problems that life faces. Losing a passport symbolizes the presence of many differences and difficulties that affect the life of this woman.

title: Interpretation of seeing the color violet in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the color violet in a dream. The color violet comes from the violet flower, which is characterized by its bright and beautiful color. Violet is a symbol of beauty and romance, and therefore we find it used in romantic poetry and literature. The color violet in a dream shows the emotional state that the dreamer is going through. Plato said that the color violet symbolizes Love and friendship. The interpretation of seeing the color violet in a dream for men has another interpretation, as it shows the strength, influence, and strong personality of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the color violet for a single woman: A woman who sees herself wearing a purple dress indicates optimism, happiness, romance, and a bright future that should be enjoyed. Seeing violet for a single woman has another interpretation that symbolizes the sincerity of another’s love for her. What if she wears purple shoes in a dream? This indicates a good effort that will gain acceptance and satisfaction. Seeing shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman means that the man is seeking to win her love, and the beautiful shoe in a dream is her future husband. Interpretation of seeing The color violet for a married woman. A married woman sees in a dream that violet dominates the house, whether with curtains or furniture, which indicates the happiness and tranquility that she enjoys. And we see that she is wearing a purple dress and is beautiful, this indicates her psychological state and her sense of stability and security. Seeing a married woman wearing violet shoes indicates success and excellence. And positive changes in her life, and it may indicate that she will travel. Interpretation of seeing the color violet for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman seeing the color violet in a dream, and this indicates the peace and happiness that the dreamer enjoys, and seeing her wearing a purple dress, and this indicates the fulfillment of her desires. Purple shoes, and this indicates in the dream the strength of the bond between her and her. Her husband and her financial situation improves and her goals are achieved. Interpretation of seeing a violet flower in a dream Female vision Unrelated That these violet flowers are collected In a dream, this indicates that he will soon meet his future husband. And the woman is married / married Which one do you see? A group of violet flowers This indicates moments of happiness and a life full of love in the future. Who See in a dream? A withered violet flower. This indicates the failure of an emotional relationship. Therefore, we have provided you with all the interpretations about seeing the color violet and the violet flower. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Advance Encyclopedia Interpretation of the ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin through what was narrated by dream interpretation scholars, and it is one of the decorative tools and ornaments that women use by placing different shapes, either gold or silver, on their finger because they are the same. It is one of the most valuable gifts that a man can give to a woman, in addition to the interest of many in obtaining rings specially made of gold. Some people may have a vision of the ring during their sleep, and this vision has multiple cases and different interpretations depending on the social status of the fortuneteller and the type of ring, which we will detail below, So follow us. Interpretation of the ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says when he saw the ring in a dream: The silver ring in a dream symbolizes kindness and sustenance, while the ring shows the dignity and prestige that a person possesses. The silver ring indicates the marriage of a single woman and the wife and her beauty to married people. Whoever sees that the Messenger of God prayed May God bless him and grant him peace, giving him a silver ring, as it is a good omen that brings blessings and pleasure to the dreamer. A silver ring in a dream is generally a good omen that symbolizes the wife and son, and it also indicates a change in the dreamer’s life for the better in all aspects of his life. Whoever buys a silver ring in a dream can He buys a new car or a new house, and buying it may indicate that he will reach a prominent position. On the other hand, the golden ring is a bad omen, and seeing it indicates fire, and the copper ring is a sign of the jinn. The ring in a dream is for a single girl, and this vision has different meanings, including good and evil. We will separate it in the following points: The ring in one dream symbolizes marriage or a life partner. If the ring is made of silver, it is a sign of separation between her and the one with whom she had an emotional relationship, while giving her a silver ring indicates the imminence of marriage. A ring studded with shiny gemstones indicates... That her life partner will be a man of prestige and power. A broken ring in a single woman’s dream indicates the end of an emotional relationship that causes sadness. Interpretation of a dream about a ring in a dream for a married woman: Below we provide an interpretation for a married woman who sees a ring in a dream: A husband who presents a ring to his wife in her dream indicates that she will become pregnant. Soon with good offspring. The ring in a married woman’s dream symbolizes kindness and plenty of sustenance for her and her family. Losing a ring in a married woman’s dream indicates problems between her and her husband that may lead to divorce. The ring in a dream for a pregnant womanThe interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman seeing a ring is often related to sex The fetus, and to clarify this we mention the following: If a pregnant woman sees a golden ring in a dream, this indicates that she is pregnant with a male child. While seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with a silver ring means that she will give birth to a girl. The ring encrusted with shiny gemstones in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes status. The high status and superiority that her newborn enjoys, and that he will become beautiful in character and character, and God Almighty alone knows what is in the wombs. Interpretation of cutting a ring in a dream Ibn Sirin says about cutting a ring in a dream and other jewelry that this indicates marriage.

title: Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream about Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream about Al-Asimi. Interpretation of dreams: Paper money in a dream. The loss will be evidence of losing a lot of money. A dream about burning banknotes is a sign of loss or theft. But if he sees in a dream that he is counting money and it is missing, this indicates great sadness. Interpretation of a dream about papers Cash in one dream. A single girl’s dream of receiving paper money in a dream indicates confusion and insecurity. She sees a lot of paper proof of marriage to a well-off man. An unmarried woman dreams of receiving paper money from a married woman, this indicates that she will face some problems in her life. Interpretation Dream of banknotes for a married woman: A married woman who dreams of paper money in a dream is evidence that she will meet a loyal friend. A married woman’s dream of losing her money indicates the loss of some friends. But if she sees her face engraved on a banknote, this indicates the abundance of money that she will obtain. Interpretation of a dream about banknotes for a pregnant woman. Collecting silver coins in a dream for a pregnant woman is an indication of feeding a baby girl. If she sees gold coins, this indicates that she will give birth to a male child. Collecting banknotes in a dream indicates a lot of good and abundant food. Interpretation of a man’s dream of paper moneyDream of money A dollar bill in a dream is an accusation of a dollar. It is an indication of prosperity in life and a new life. As for an unmarried young man’s dream of a dollar, it is an indication that he will get married soon. As for a man’s dream of collecting paper money in a dream and burning it, this indicates debts, problems, and loss of money. A dream of collecting money from dirt indicates To wealth and fortune, or to buy land and real estate, or to change circumstances for the better. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: I dreamed that I was talking to a dead person

preview.html: I dreamed that I was talking to a dead person through a website roy2a.com, seeing dead people is one of the dreams that is widely spread among people. Everyone has someone close to them that they miss. It is considered one of the most comforting visions for many people because it extinguishes the flame of longing, especially if the deceased was beloved, and we will present the most important interpretations that came from the lips of superior translators such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen in this matter, so follow us. I dreamed that I was talking to a dead person. Most interpretation scholars tell us Dreams that words come from the dead. He speaks the truth and this is because he is in the house of truth and he has nothing to lie or play with. Words from the dead to the living in a dream. Its interpretation often comes as a sermon or gospel. When seeing the dead returned to life, this is an indication that this dead person is in a position worthy of praise, if he wishes. God. Seeing a dead person crying in a dreamHe is in dire need of prayer and charity to alleviate his suffering. The vision shows that a dead person comes to the dreamer’s house. He enters into that, and the dreamer is going through a difficult time, because for him the vision is news of the imminent relief and the disappearance of his worries and sorrows. I dreamed that a dead man He was talking to me and asked me to sit next to him. The vision shows the end of the dreamer’s term, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking about someone in a dream. I dreamed that I was talking to a dead Ibn Sirin. Seeing a dead person talking to a dreamer in a dream has blamed him or advised him as a sign that the dreamer is rising. With unpeaceful actions, this dream is a warning to reverse one’s mistakes. Seeing a dead person in a dream indicates that he was in good condition, and the dreamer was told that he is alive, and that this person is in a high place in the sky. As for seeing a dead person asking a dreamer about something in a dream? Such as food or drink, this indicates... The dead person’s need for prayer and zakat on his behalf. I dreamed of a dead person giving me food in a dream. This dream is good for its owner and for the sustenance that will come to him in the near future. Talking to a dead person in a dream. A long conversation may be a sign of the long life of the Prophet, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing someone talking To a dead person in a dream: I dreamed that I was talking to a dead person about one person. Seeing a dead person giving one gift in a dream is a sign of happiness and getting closer to her in her life, such as marriage and engagement. When an unmarried woman sees that she has died in a dream, and again the dream is a warning to her that she will commit sins. Or she commits a sin and must repent and return to God. Seeing a dead man laughing in the face of an unmarried woman indicates that while she was sleeping, joy, comfort, and changes came to her in her life for the better. I dreamed that I was talking to a dead man about a married woman. Seeing a dead man talking and giving advice in a dream indicates that a married woman wants help in her life. And this is good news that God is with her in the steps of her life. Visiting the house of a dead person in a dream indicates the good that will come to her and the changes that erase the best in her life. Hearing the voice of the dead person in a dream asks the dreamer to follow him and he refuses, indicating that he will face problems and obstacles in the coming period, but they are It will pass, God willing

title: Learn about the interpretation of dogs in a dream for an unmarried woman from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about small dogs for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Dogs in a single person’s dream Among the visions that are followed by confusion in the fortuneteller’s feelings, some see it as a sign of the presence of a person who fears him and supports him, and others believe that behind the special interpretation hides a shameful meaning and a sign of being betrayed. And tomorrow, but the correct interpretation is made according to different considerations, perhaps the most important of which is the condition of the dreamer as well as the condition in which dogs appeared in the vision, and this is what we explain in the following lines. Dogs in a single person’s dream Seeing dogs in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that carry many negative interpretations and indicates the presence of a group of haters around her who are conspiring against her. Black dogs in a dream are shameful dreams that indicate that the viewer is exposed to many problems and obstacles in life, whether at the educational or career level. Seeing single white dogs playing and playing with them is one of the good dreams that warns the dreamer of hearing news that makes him very happy and can be a sign of loyal friends who always stand by the dreamer. Seeing unmarried women is a set of words that they chase but cannot escape from, and it is an indication that the dreamer falls prey to some wrong ideas and beliefs and should consult those who are knowledgeable and wise to avoid being exposed to unnecessary crises. A dream of dogs for a single woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing dogs in a dream is a hateful vision and is a warning from God Almighty to the dreamer to abandon sins and disobedience Who commits it secretly and publicly. If you see single dogs barking loudly, this is a sign of a young man who loves her and wants to get engaged to her. Gray dogs in a single dream indicate that the dreamer is exposed to a major financial problem, and it may develop into an accumulation of debts on her shoulders. Dead dogs in a dream are a sign that the viewer is exposed to a serious illness and may undergo several surgeries, and this disease may be the cause of her death. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search Google for the interpretation of dreams on the Internet. The most important interpretations of dogs in a dream for individuals Interpretation of a dream of black dogs for single women According to what Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi narrated, seeing single black dogs in a dream is a shameful vision, and an indication of the dreamer's bad companions, and her drowning with them in the path of lusts and sins. While if an unmarried woman sees black dogs surrounded by love and tenderness, it is one of the good visions that show the presence of a person and the dreamer has all the love and respect and wishes to be associated with her, as it was said that predatory black dogs are also an indication of the problems and obstacles that stand in the way of insight. Seeing pet dogs in a dream for a woman Single: Pet dogs in a person's dream are considered good visions that indicate the dreamer's ability to achieve his future goals and dreams. Perhaps pet dogs in a dream mean entering into a profitable business project from which the dreamer earns large sums of money that change her life circumstances for the better. She takes care of and raises a group of pet dogs, as it is a sign of her marriage. Approaching a person of good morals. Feeding a dog in

title: Interpretation of a dream about my deceased grandmother, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed of my dead grandmother Among the dreams that may come to many people, especially in the first period after death, and therefore the dreamer searches for an interpretation of this dream and carries many meanings for the interpreters according to the nature of the vision. His angry grandmother. I dreamed of my dead grandmother I dreamed of my dead grandmother Evidence of the extent of the dreamer's love and longing for his grandmother, and here he must often pray for her for forgiveness, mercy and entry into heaven. The dream of the dead grandmother may indicate the dreamer's desire to achieve some goals and desires in his personal life and that he will succeed as long as he continues in his goal and strives to achieve it. Sometimes the dream of the dead grandmother symbolizes the dreamer's need to pray a lot for her with forgiveness and mercy, and the dream can also be a sign for the dreamer to give alms on behalf of his grandmother. I dreamed of Ibn Sirin's dead grandmother I dreamed of my dead grandmother because the sign Ibn Sirin is evidence that the dreamer feels a strong desire to see his grandmother again and sit with her, and the dream can be a longing for everything that has passed. In his life, and here the dream is a sign for him that he must continue to struggle with supplication to ask for help from Almighty God. Sometimes the dream of the dead grandmother shows the dreamer's desire to get rid of the problems and worries in his life by traveling to a distant place, and the dream of the dead grandmother can be an indication that the dreamer is one of the people of righteousness and piety, or a warning if the dreamer commits sins, and neglects the duties of his religion, he stops them and begins to adhere to the teachings of Islam and follow them until God is pleased with him. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the dead grandmother in a dream in an ugly way may indicate the imminent death of the dreamer, and here he should not panic and care about his religion more than before, and God knows best. I dreamed of my dead grandmother I dreamed that my deceased grandmother carries many things for the unmarried girl, some of which are good and some of which are bad, according to the details of the dream. And if the deceased grandmother in the dream tries to talk to the fortune teller, this means that the various issues of her life are going well and that they are in a permanent solution. The dream of the dead grandmother lying on the bed is evidence for the viewer of the stability of practical and emotional life and that her affairs with her family are at their best and she must work to continue that. He is close to achieving the dreams that he has long desired, he just needs to continue working hard and be patient and persevering. As for the dream of the dead grandmother who is sad, this indicates that the fortune teller's dreams will not come true in the near future, and here he should not despair and continue to pray to God Almighty for the coming of goodness to her and happiness. Interpretation of the dream of my dead grandmother alive for singles Sometimes an unmarried girl sees a dream of a dead grandmother and she returns to life, and here the dream symbolizes the fortune teller's strong desire to see her grandmother again and her longing for all the past memories, so here she must pray a lot to God Almighty. Patience for her and mercy and forgiveness for her grandmother. I dreamed of my dead married grandmother. I dreamed of my dead grandmother in a dream, and she gave me something as evidence for the married woman that goodness and blessings will come to her life and home in the coming period, God Almighty. As you see that

title: The most important and accurate 27 interpretations of seeing a pen in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretations of Ibn Sirin and senior scholars regarding seeing a pen in a dream. The pen is one of the things mentioned in the Qur’an other than its known uses in our current lives. Seeing her in a dream certainly expresses many symbols and meanings. You will learn through an Egyptian website its effects and what it means in the dream of a married, single, pregnant or married woman. Read below and you will find a solution to all the codes of your dreams. The pen in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of the pen according to the interpretation of Nabulsi. Two signs appear. The first sign is the educational advancement that the dreamer will obtain or the presidency of a state or country. The dream has another meaning because it It indicates a man of his type who enters the family, knowing that he wishes to be able to study. In various fields of science. Commentators said that if the dreamer sees himself using a large, clear writing pen, this means that he is an honest person who hates ambiguity and words that carry more than one meaning. If the dreamer writes in his dream with a pencil, this indicates his negligence and the repetition of his mistakes, but he soon discovers This mistake and he tries to atone for it and repent from it. If the dreamer sees in his dream a pen with ink, this explains the clarity of his decisions and the rigor of his actions and behavior. If the dreamer dreams that he was writing in his dream and suddenly finds that one of his fingers has turned into a pen that he uses to write, then this indicates that the dreamer A serious and steady personality in his work. If the dreamer sees a judge in a dream and sees that he is holding a pen in one of his hands, then this dream has two meanings. The first meaning confirms that the dreamer will enter court soon because he has committed a crime against society and the law and his punishment will be imprisonment. The second meaning confirms that if the dreamer desires to God gives him a powerful travel opportunity to start his life through, then this dream indicates the fulfillment of the desire to travel, knowing that both previous meanings depend on the dreamer’s condition in reality. If the dreamer is passionate about trade and works in it and sees that he has a pen in his hand, this will be a symbol He trades in halal products and this will make his trade safe and untainted by any defect. For male and female students, this dream reflects their amazing superiority. The interpreters said that this dream in the dream of the plumber, the carpenter, the tailor, and all the owners of trades and crafts shows their strength in their craft and their approach to it. An advanced level in it, and if the boat owner sees that he is putting the pen behind his ear, then this dream will have the same meaning as the previous dream. The pen in the patient’s dream is healing, and in the dream of an unmarried person, marriage to a pure and virtuous girl, and it is confirmed. Ibn Sirin If the dreamer takes a pen and writes with it in the dream, this means That he will study the words he wrote, which means that if the dreamer finds himself writing words specific to the field of psychology, this means that he will become a psychologist and if he finds himself writing numbers and solving equations, this means that he will complete his studies in a special field in the world of numbers and accounts, such as commerce and finance. And he excels in it. When the dreamer sees that he was writing with a pen and suddenly the ink ran out and ended, this is a symbol of the end of the years of the dreamer’s life and he will soon ascend to heaven and take into account what he did during his lifetime.
